title: Introducing ChatGPT Pulse
optimized_headline: Discover ChatGPT Pulse: A Game-Changer for AI Conversations
raw_excerpt: Today we're releasing a preview of ChatGPT Pulse to Pro users on mobile. Pulse is a new experience where ChatGPT proactively does research to deliver personalized updates based on your chats, feedback, and connected apps like your calendar.
raw_body: Today we're releasing a preview of ChatGPT Pulse to Pro users on mobile. Pulse is a new experience where ChatGPT proactively does research to deliver personalized updates based on your chats, feedback, and connected apps like your calendar.
speedrun: OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Pulse, a feature for Pro users on mobile devices. This tool proactively conducts research to provide tailored updates, drawing from user chats, feedback, and connected applications like calendars. By integrating personal data, it aims to enhance user experience and efficiency. This matters now as it represents a shift towards more personalized AI interactions, potentially improving how users manage their information.
why_it_matters: Pro users will experience a more tailored interaction, making it easier to receive updates relevant to their needs.
This development suggests a broader trend towards personalized AI tools, signaling a shift in how users engage with technology.

lenses.eli12: ChatGPT Pulse is like having a personal assistant that knows what you need before you ask. It looks at your conversations and connected apps to give you updates that matter. This could help everyday people stay organized and informed without needing to dig through information themselves.
lenses.pm: For product managers, ChatGPT Pulse highlights a growing user need for personalized experiences. By leveraging user data, it could improve engagement and retention. This means considering how to integrate similar personalized features into products to enhance user satisfaction.
lenses.engineer: ChatGPT Pulse operates by utilizing user interactions and data from connected apps to deliver personalized updates. This approach relies on advanced machine learning models that analyze user behavior and preferences. It's important to note that the effectiveness of such personalization depends on the quality of the data and user feedback.
